title: Ecommerce Website
description: An Ecommerce Website I built as part of this unit. With a login system, contact form and even the ability to add items to your kart

title: Maze Solving Robot
description: This robot used a single proximity sensor to its left and a light sensor in the front to navigate its way through a complex maze unassisted.

title: Automatic Plant Waterer
description: An automatic plant watering system using an arduino. It read the soils moisture and when it droped too low it turned on a pump which watered the plant to a desired level.
